virtual-sensor.name: WundergroundHourlyEtApi
virtual-sensor.description: Hourly virtual sensor for Wunderground KSBA station. ET parameters. Needs API key. Runs twice per hour.

source.query: select _____current_observation__station_id as station ,_____current_observation__local_epoch as epoch_date ,_____current_observation__temp_c as temp ,_____current_observation__local_epoch as epoch_hour ,_____current_observation__dewpoint_c as dew_pnt ,_____current_observation__precip_today_metric as precip_day ,_____current_observation__relative_humidity as rel_hum ,_____current_observation__precip_1hr_metric as precip_hour ,_____current_observation__pressure_in as vap_pres ,_____current_observation__solarradiation as sol_rad ,_____current_observation__wind_dir as wind_dir ,_____current_observation__pressure_mb as pressure, _____current_observation__display_location__latitude as lat ,_____current_observation__wind_kph as wind_spd , _____current_observation__display_location__longitude as lon ,_____current_observation__display_location__zip as zip, date_of_measurement from wrapper
